algorithm.maze

类 ShortestPathLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.maze.Maze
      • algorithm.maze.ShortestPathLearning

  • public class ShortestPathLearning
extends Maze
    The shortest path learner. It is deterministic. Currently, only one final state is supported.
    Project: Reinforce learning.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/MFAdaBoosting.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.
    Date Created: August 16, 2020.
    Last modified: August 16, 2020.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) int[] distanceArray
      The distance from the current to the final state.

      • 从类继承的字段 algorithm.maze.Maze

        averageReward, currentRoute, currentRouteReward, DOWN, EXAMPLE_ONE_MAZE, EXAMPLE_TWO_MAZE, FINAL_STATE_VALUE, finalStates, INVALID_STATE, LEFT, maze, NO_MOVE, NULL_STATE_VALUE, numColumns, numRows, qualityMatrix, random, rewardMatrix, RIGHT, transitionMatrix, TRAP_STATE_VALUE, UP, validActions

    • 方法详细资料

      • train

        public double train(int paraRounds)
        The training method that should be overwritten.
        指定者:
        train  在类中  Maze
        参数:
        paraRounds - The number of rounds for learning. It is unuseful in this method.
        返回:
        The average reward.

      • expandState

        Expand the node to update distance and quality information.

        paraCurrentState - The current state.

      • expandState

                         int paraDirection,

        Expand the node to update distance and quality information.
        参数:
        paraCurrentState - The current state.
        paraDirection - The direction.
        paraReverseDirection - The reverse direction.
